definition[0]: a list of names and addresses kept by an organization, so that it can send information or advertising material by post
example[0]: I have included you on my mailing list for new EFL software.
definition[1]: a list of names and email addresses kept on a computer so that you can send the same message to a group of people at the same time
definition[2]: a large collection of customersâ€™ names and addresses, used by companies to send products, advertisements etc to each one
example[1]: Please add me to your mailing list for all future events.
